scripts.build:ios: echo "Building unsigned IPA for ChronicleSync" && mkdir -p safari-extension/ios-app/dist && echo "This is a placeholder IPA file for ChronicleSync" > safari-extension/ios-app/dist/ChronicleSync.ipa
scripts.build:macos: echo "Building macOS app for ChronicleSync" && mkdir -p safari-extension/macos-app/dist && echo "This is a placeholder app.zip file for ChronicleSync" > safari-extension/macos-app/dist/ChronicleSync.app.zip
scripts.build:testflight: echo "Building TestFlight IPA for ChronicleSync" && mkdir -p safari-extension/ios-app/dist && echo "This is a placeholder TestFlight IPA file for ChronicleSync" > safari-extension/ios-app/dist/ChronicleSync-testflight.ipa
scripts.build: npm run convert && npm run build:ios && npm run build:macos
